title: Republic Day
description: Republic Day is a national holiday in India.

title: Independence Day
description: Independence Day marks the end of British rule in 1947.

title: Gandhi Jayanti
description: Gandhi Jayanti is celebrated in honor of Mahatma Gandhi's birthday.

title: Diwali
description: Diwali is the festival of lights celebrated by Hindus.

title: Holi
description: Holi is the festival of colors celebrated by Hindus.

title: Christmas
description: Christmas is celebrated to commemorate the birth of Jesus Christ.

title: Eid al-Fitr
description: Eid al-Fitr is celebrated by Muslims marking the end of Ramadan.

title: Raksha Bandhan
description: Raksha Bandhan celebrates the bond between brothers and sisters.

title: Makar Sankranti
description: Makar Sankranti is a harvest festival celebrated in various parts of India.

title: Janmashtami
description: Janmashtami marks the birth of Lord Krishna.

title: Navratri
description: Navratri is a festival dedicated to the worship of the Hindu deity Durga.
